reviewText: Wish this could play in the us. Cuz l really  loved their Christmas  specials.
So excited for this purchase but the region code was not right on the DVD. Can't watch it at all
Should have read the details and reviews .... this is NOT able to play in American equipment ....
I CAN'T GET IT TO PLAY IN ANY OF OUR MACHINES, VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH IT...

I really wish this was available on American DVD!!! It would be nice to see this again as all I have is the VHS and cannot watch it anymore.
Why can't this be made and shipped in the USA ???  Very disappointed....
